name: Trick Room
effect: Invert the order of initiative. Lasts 4 Rounds. If performed under Cosmic Rays weather, this move targets one side of the field, user's choice and has a different effect. Instead this move now makes those affected add their dexterity as a negative modifier to Initiative rolls.
description: This Reality altering move can manipulate time, making those that are normally fast slowed to a crawl and vice versa.
